snippet: Nearly 400,000 refugees and migrants have arrived in Greece by crossing the Mediterranean Sea this year.
abstract: United Nations releases new figures on number of refugees and migrants seeking European sanctuary to date in 2015; Greece has most, with 400,000 arriving via Mediterranean, followed by Italy, with 131,000.
lead_paragraph: Nearly 400,000 refugees and migrants have arrived in Greece by crossing the Mediterranean Sea this year.

headline.main: Greece: A Record Number of Migrants Come Ashore
headline.print_headline: Europe; Greece: A Record Number of Migrants Come Ashore

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
